# Geometric

> Geometric distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var geometric = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/geometric' );
```

#### geometric

Geometric distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = geometric;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
